Articles.Content:
I'm looking for some nice colonization mods because for the fineprint mod I need to build a base on the mun and minimus but I don't really like the vanilla parts to build a base.

I hope you guys know a good or some good mods.

Thanks

Its called USI now, combines MKS (Modular Kolonization System) and OKS (Orbital Kolonization System), in combination with Life Support, Scansat and stuff you really can dive deep into this kind of gameplay, alot of new resources to mine and organize, it gets quite complex.

OMG that konquest mod looks so awesome, shame it isn't released yet...

I will take a look at the USI Kolonization Systems mod, it looks very promising, right now I don't use life support but I sure will with this mod.

I also use scansat but I can't realy see which part is responsible for that? a new scansat part would be cool.
